settings.title: Trade Tools & Supplies for Deal Professionals
settings.paragraph_1: Deal's desirable conservation area, the stretch of Georgian townhouses along Middle Street and Beach Street, and the residential growth around Mill Hill and Sholden all generate consistent demand for quality building and renovation work. Invicta Tools at our Ramsgate branch is a 20-minute drive via the A256 — your nearest authorised trade counter for Makita and DeWalt professional power tools.
settings.paragraph_2: Period property work in Deal's conservation zone requires precision and care. Our cordless ranges from Makita and DeWalt include the compact, brushless tools that make all the difference in tight spaces and delicate settings — from the Makita DTM52 multitool to DeWalt's atomic compact series. We also carry the finishing consumables: fine-grit abrasives, quality sealants and stainless steel fixings.
settings.paragraph_3: Deal tradespeople can also reach our Canterbury branch in about 30 minutes via the A2 — whichever branch suits your route. Free delivery over £30 to CT14 postcodes, and click-and-collect available at both locations.

settings.title: Need Tools in Deal?
settings.subtitle: Call our Ramsgate branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
